name: Postful
overview:
Postful lets individuals and companies send full color letters and postcards using the web, email, or API calls.

Postful expand the concept of Software as a Service to include manufacturing and physical processes, in this case printed mail. Users are able to make requests of that manufacturing process just as they would any other web service or site.

On the consumer side, Postful let individuals handle all their mailing needs online. Vacation postcards can be sent from anywhere, with your own photos. Friends and family members who aren’t online can be easily reached by creating custom email addresses that print and mail physical letters when used.

Businesses can handle the portion of their clients and contacts who prefer paper using the same systems they use for their online clients.
